name: Street Fighter DBZ RED
description:
P1 Controls:

Key A or Left Arrow - Move Left

Key D or Right Arrow - Move Right

Key W or Up Arrow - Jump

Key F - Light Punch

Key G - Heavy Punch

Key C - Light Kick

Key V - Heavy Kick

Key T - Block

P2 Controls:

Key Left Arrow - Move Left

Key Right Arrow - Move Right

Key Up Arrow - Jump

Key O - Light Punch

Key P - Heavy Punch

Key K - Light Kick

Key K - Heavy Kick

Key I - Block
